mapper.select: SELECT W.*,S.*,C.CONT_NAME AS CONT_NAME, M.NAME AS INSPEC_MGR_NAME FROM WORK_LIST W LEFT OUTER JOIN SITE_LIST S ON W.SITE_IDX = S.SITE_IDX AND S.DELYN ='N' LEFT OUTER JOIN CONTRACTOR_LIST C ON W.CONT_IDX = C.CONT_IDX AND C.DELYN ='N' LEFT OUTER JOIN MANAGER_LIST M ON W.INSPEC_MGR_IDX = M.MANAGER_IDX AND M.DELYN ='N' WHERE W.DELYN='N' AND W.WORK_IDX = #{work_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORK_LIST(WORK_IDX, SITE_IDX, WRITE_USER_IDX, CONT_IDX, ISCHARGE, WORKTYPE, WORKSTATUS, CATEGORY1, CATEGORY2, CATEGORY3, WORKCODE, WORKNAME, WORKTITLE, STARTDATE, STARTTIME, ENDDATE, ENDTIME, PLACECODES, PLACENAMES, ADDR_DETAIL, PIC_NAME, PIC_BIRTH ,PIC_PHONE, PIC_POSITION, PIC_POS_DETAIL, PIC_NUM_WORKER, WORKLEVEL, REMARK, REMARK_LEADER, REMARK_CHIEF, INSPEC_MGR_IDX, RISK_LEVEL, RISK_GRADE, RISK_WARN, PTW_EXIST, PUI_EXIST, WRITETIME, UPDATETIME, DELYN ) SELECT #{work_idx}, #{site_idx}, #{write_user_idx}, #{cont_idx}, #{ischarge}, #{worktype}, #{workstatus}, #{category1}, #{category2}, #{category3}, #{workcode}, #{workname}, #{worktitle}, #{startdate}, #{starttime}, #{enddate}, #{endtime}, #{placecodes}, #{placenames}, #{addr_detail}, #{pic_name}, #{pic_birth}, #{pic_phone}, #{pic_position}, #{pic_pos_detail}, #{pic_num_worker}, #{worklevel}, #{remark}, #{remark_leader}, #{remark_chief}, #{inspec_mgr_idx}, #{risk_level}, #{risk_grade}, #{risk_warn}, #{ptw_exist}, #{pui_exist}, sysdate(), sysdate(), 'N' FROM DUAL
